archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Update Loyalty Program Account
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Update a loyalty program account and make changes to loyalty program participant information.

properties.value: Update Loyalty Program Account makes updates to a loyalty program account, such as changing a pin/password or the name of the account. The Party Relationship Development & Retirement process is used to make changes to loyalty program participant information, such as name, contact information, profile, demographics, and bill/ship to.
